
# Yuki Kuro Website

This repository contains the source code of my brother [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/%40yukikuro____-%23E4405F?logo=instagram&logoColor=white
)](https://instagram.com/yukikuro___)'s website. It was developed using Laravel and Tailwind CSS.

## Table of Contents

- [About](#about)
- [Technologies Used](#technologies-used)
- [Setup](#setup)
- [Usage](#usage)

## About

This portfolio website serves as a showcase of my projects, skills, and experiences. It provides visitors with information about my work and allows them to get in touch with me.

## Technologies Used

- ![Laravel](https://img.shields.io/badge/Laravel-%23FF2D20?logo=Laravel&logoColor=white) Laravel is a PHP web application framework used for developing robust and maintainable web applications.

- ![Tailwindcss](https://img.shields.io/badge/TailwindCSS-%2306B6D4?logo=Tailwindcss&logoColor=white)
 Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for building custom designs without having to leave your HTML.

- ![Flowbite](https://img.shields.io/badge/Flowbite-5468ff.svg?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)
 Flowbite is a Tailwind CSS component library that provides additional UI components and utilities.

- ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/SplideJs-%230c1012.svg?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)
 Intervention Image is a open source PHP image processing library, supports PHP's two most common image processing libraries GD Library and Imagick.

- ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Intervention_Image-%23dee4ed.svg?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,) Splide.js is a lightweight, flexible, and customizable slider/carousel library for JavaScript, designed for modern web applications.


## Setup

1. **Clone the repository:**
   ```
   git clone https://github.com/dedekanandaa/Laravel-YukiKuro.git
   ```

2. **Install dependencies:**
   ```
   composer install
   npm install
   ```

3. **Set up environment variables:**
   ```
   cp .env.example .env
   php artisan key:generate
   ```

   Update the `.env` file with your database configuration and any other necessary settings.

4. **Run migrations:**
   ```
   php artisan migrate
   ```

5. **Compile assets:**
   ```
   npm run dev
   ```

6. **Serve the application:**
   ```
   php artisan serve
   ```

## Usage

Once the setup is complete, visit `http://localhost:8000` in your web browser to view the website.
